# callout(_:)

**Type Method**

Presents the accessory as an annotation callout on the map.

## Declaration

```swift
static func callout(_ style: MapItemDetailSelectionAccessoryStyle.CalloutStyle = .automatic) -> MapItemDetailSelectionAccessoryStyle
```

## Parameters

- **style**: The [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MapItemDetailSelectionAccessoryStyle/CalloutStyle] to use.

## Place information

- **MapItemDetailSelectionAccessoryStyle**: The map item detail selection accessory style.
- **mapItemDetailSelectionAccessory(_:)**: Specifies the selection accessory to display for the selected map item content.
